lead_paragraph: Force India’s Nico Hulkenberg was handed a one-place grid penalty for the German Grand Prix following a breach of tire rules in Saturday’s qualifying session.

headline.print_headline: Force India’s Hulkenberg Gets Grid Penalty for Tire Error
headline.main: Force India’s Hulkenberg Gets Grid Penalty for Tire Error

snippet: Force India’s Nico Hulkenberg was handed a one-place grid penalty for the German Grand Prix following a breach of tire rules in Saturday’s qualifying session....
